short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert text to speech with advanced audio management

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"ReadMe" makes reading web content effortless by converting any selected text into speech with just a few clicks. Whether youâ€™re on the go, have accessibility needs, or prefer listening over reading, this extension provides a seamless and reliable solution.

Convert selected text into natural-sounding speech.
Easy to use, lightweight, and responsive.
Perfect for accessibility needs, productivity, or reducing screen fatigue.
